title: Make custom games more customisable
body:
Have you ever wanted to try a new build, however you were forced to spend 30 minutes in a custom game to farm in order to become full build. I strongly believe custom games should be more customisable. e.g. select starting level, select starting gold, select starting time. This will be a very efficient way for example a {{champion:11}}  verses {{champion:11}}  with different builds, testing which one does more base damage. It will also create a funner environment for all players to enjoy. Just as riot is able to create champion spotlight videos with minions staying still, not to that extent i would like to strongly urge us taking a step forward and better ourselves at league with this creation of more customisable games. I've recently heard dota has released a simular feature and, not to try copy, would love for such a thing to be implemented within the league of legends society. Let us not say {{champion:150}} but instead {{champion:245}}  this plea among the society and begin this road to the true custom games. Thank you very much for reading

Tl:dr: Lets make custom games more customisable by adding starting golds and champions level / time{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
